alert.note: Alert for Bastrop (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Caldwell and central Bastrop Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lockhart, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lockhart, Elgin, Bastrop, Mustang Ridge, Cedar Creek, Camp Swift, Wyldwood, Circle D-KC Estates, Webberville, Phelan, McDade, Cedar Hills, Lytton Springs, Dale, Bateman, St John Colony, Butler, Rockne and Garfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
